evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: not beyond twenty-eight days from this order. Federal Rule 65 ... may issue for fourteen days and extend to twenty-eight days for good cause.

extracted.value: twenty-eight days: temporary restraining order remains until preliminary injunction hearing or no longer than twenty-eight days

evidence.source_document: Order Clarifying Scope of Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: the escrow of $1 billion to address the homelessness crisis, offers of shelter or housing to all unhoused individuals in Skid Row within 180 days

extracted.value: 180 days: the escrow of $1 billion to address the homelessness crisis, offers of shelter or housing to all unhoused individuals in Skid Row within 180 days
